Muscle.name: Go Toe To Toe
Muscle.description: When you use your abilities to overcome someone or something in a struggle for control, state what your goal is. Your opponent can describe how they respond, at their option. Roll+Muscle.
hold: You manage to achieve your goal, e.g., take something they hold.
You get them good, giving your opponent harm as established by your attacks
You block, dodge, or counter their best attempts.(If you don't choose this, they will do Harm to you as established).
Muscle.6-: You fail to accomplish your goal, and take Harm or Stress as established

Muscle.name: Hit With All You've Got
Muscle.description: When you have a clear shot and you use your strength to hit someone or something with all you've got, roll+Muscle. On a hit, you give Harm to your opponent as established.
hold: You take cover or secure a superior position. If you don't choose this, they can give you Harm
You get them good (+1 Harm).
You control the collateral damage.
You hold the target's attention, if possible.
You gain the upper hand. Take 1 Juice.
Muscle.6-: You fail to hit them and, and take Harm or Stress as established

Finesse.name: Sneak Around
Finesse.description: When you use your agility to act secretly or deceptively, roll+Finesse.
Finesse.13+: Everyone that should fall for it falls for it, and you get a little something extra. Take 1 Juice.
Finesse.10+: Everyone that should fall for it falls for it.
Finesse.7-9: As above, but it's complicated. The MC chooses 1:
hold: Someone unimportant noticed you, but that just made them important, right?
You are perceived only by a secondary sense (someone picks up your scent while you're stalking them; you're seen whispering a message but the message is not heard).
You must leave something important behind or be discovered
Finesse.6-: You are noticed, but still have a chance to escape

Finesse.name: Take The Shot
Finesse.description: When you take aim and shoot at an enemy at range (close or far), roll +Finesse.
hold: You keep your position for another shot
You create an advantage. Take 1 Juice
Do 1 more harm
Finesse.7-9: You deal damage but lose your position; you must move to take another shot.
Finesse.6-: You miss and the MC makes a move against you

Grit.name: To Protect and Serve
Grit.description: When you stand in defense of another person, an item, or a location under attack, roll +Grit.
Grit.13+: As for 10+, and inflict 1 Harm or Stress on the attacker
hold: Redirect an attack to yourself
Reduce the Harm or Stress of the attack by 1
Create an advantage. Create 1 Juice
Grit.6-: The original target takes harm as established, and your attempts backfires. You take -1 forward, 1 Harm, or 1 Stress, or the target takes 1 more Harm or Stress

Grit.name: Tough It Out
Grit.description: When you suffer harm, illness, poison, exhaustion, or deprivation, roll +Grit. On cases of direct physical harm, roll +Grit+Armor
Grit.13+: Avoid all Harm or Stress. If the harm or Stress is <3, heal 1 Harm or Stress
Grit.10+: You shake it off. Harm or Stress is reduced by 2
Grit.7-9: You take the effect but it is reduced. Harm or Stress is reduced by 1.
Grit.6-: The effect as expected. Take Harm or Stress as established

Moxie.name: Talk Them Into It
Moxie.description: When you use your abilities to talk, threaten, or seduce someone into doing something, roll+Moxie.
Moxie.13+: Hold 3, and you may turn them into a +0 Contact
hold: Change the target's agenda 1-for-1 to your agena
Inflict 1 Stress on the target
Have the target comply without questions or a need for reassurance, payment, or coercion
Have them comply without eliciting suspicion from those around you
Moxie.6-: Hold 1, but the target becomes hostile

Moxie.name: Draw Them Out
Moxie.description: Use your charisma to get information from a target. When you try to charm answers from a target, roll+Moxie:
Moxie.13+: Hold 3, and you can Ask Any Question instead of just those listed
Moxie.10+: Hold 3: Spend your hold 1-for-1 to ask one of the following questions, and the MC will answer truthfully:
hold: What do you or an associate want?
What do you or an associate plan to do?
What are you or an associate hiding?
What is you or an associate's greatest power?
What is you or an associate's greatest weakness
Moxie.6-: Hold 1, but the target becomes hostile, or the MC will answer give you an answer that you wish wasn't true

Smarts.name: Investigate a Mystery
Smarts.description: When you investigate a mystery, roll +Smarts.
Smarts.13+: Hold 2. You can ask any Question, not just the listed ones
Smarts.10+: Hold 2. Hold can be spent 1 for 1 to ask Keeper one of the following questions
Smarts.7-9: Hold 1. Hold can be spent 1 for 1 to ask Keeper one of the following questions
hold: What happened here?
What sort of entity is it?
What are it's powers?
What are it's weaknesses?
Where did it go?
What was it going to do?
What is being concealed here?
Smarts.6-: Hold 1, and the MC will give you an answer you don't want to hear.

Smarts.name: Read a Bad Situation
Smarts.description: When you look around and read a bad situation, roll +Smarts.
Smarts.13+: Hold 3. You can ask any Question, not just the listed ones
Smarts.10+: Hold 3. Hold can be spent 1 for 1 to ask Keeper one of the following questions. If you act on the answers, you get +1 ongoing while the information is relevant:
hold: What's my best way in?
What's my best way out?
Are there any dangers we haven't noticed?
What's the biggest threat?
What's most vulnerable to me?
What's the best way to protect the Victims?
Smarts.6-: Hold 1, and the MC will give you an answer you don't want to hear.

Coin.name: Shell Out
Coin.description: When you need to make a purchase, the MC will set a Price. Roll +Loot+Price. Note: You may use Change the Game to try to improve your odds, but once you roll, you are committed to the outcome
Coin.13+: You get exactly what you wanted, +a little something extra. Take 1 [Gear]
Coin.10+: You get exactly what you wanted
Coin.7-9: You get what what you wanted, but it is somehow flawed or inferior. The MC will tell you how
Coin.6-: You get what what you wanted, but it is wildly flawed or inferior. The MC will tell you how at the worst possible moment

Coin.name: Grease the Wheels
Coin.description: When you wish to bribe someone or impress them with your status, roll+Coin. Note: You may use Change the Game to try to improve your odds, but once you roll, you are committed to the outcome
Coin.13+: Change the target's agenda to your agenda, and you may turn them into a +0 Contact
Coin.10+: Change the target's agenda to your agenda
Coin.7-9: Change the target's agenda to your agenda, but you must surrender 1 [Gear] or take -1 Ongoing to Coin for the rest of the session
Coin.6-: The target changes its agenda to the Oppony site of your agenda

Moves.name: Change the Game
Moves.description: When you modify the situation to generate a bonus for yourself or a hindrance for your opponent, describe the outcome you want. Then roll +the most relevant attribute (MC's decision)
Moves.13+: Take 2 Juice and juice may also be spent to: Give +1 ongoing to yourself or one of your crew, Complete a Clock, Reset a Clock
hold: Give a +1 forward to yourself or one of your Crew
Advance a Clock
Roll back a Clock
Inflict 1 Stress on a target
Moves.6-: It backfires. You take -1 forward, 1 Harm, or 1 Stress

Moves.name: Take the Risk
Moves.description: When you do something risky that is not covered by another move, describe the outcome you want. Then roll +the most relevant attribute (MC's decision)
Moves.10+: It goes off without a hitch
Moves.7-9: It works, but with a side-effect, cost, or hard choice
Moves.6-: Something goes wrong. The MC will make a move against you
